mapper.select: SELECT b.id FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS ROWNO, t.id, t.team_name, t.stadium_name,TO_CHAR(t.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as created_at FROM team t INNER JOIN stadium s ON t.stadium_name = s.stadium_name) b WHERE ROWNO = #{rowno}
SELECT team_name FROM team WHERE id = #{id}
